description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Replace position magic いれかえまほちゃん!A fixed-screen puzzle game. Your ideas and quick actions needed!Reach an exit! Shoot ★ at the enemy to swap the places!This game is the upgraded version of 「EXCHANGE POSITION」 which was nominated as 「XNA Game Studio Japan 2008 Spring Contest」.
description.short: Replace position magic いれかえまほちゃん!A fixed-screen puzzle game. Your ideas and quick actions needed!Reach an exit! Shoot ★ at the enemy to swap the places!This game is the upgraded version of 「EXCHANGE POSITION」 which was nominated as 「XNA Game Studio Japan 2008 Spring Contest」.
